Package jioc.configurer

Class AnnotationApplicationConfig<T>

java.lang.Object
jioc.configurer.AnnotationApplicationConfig<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationConfig
public class AnnotationApplicationConfig<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicationConfig
Implementation of ApplicationConfig interface providing annotation-based configuration. It allows for automatic scan of a given array of packages for any classes with the @Pea annotation, as well as dependency injection in case it encounters @AutoInject annotation.
See Also:
AnnotatedPea

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AnnotationApplicationConfig​(java.lang.String[] packages)
    Create a new AnnotationApplicationConfig which takes an array of package names to be scanned for components that will be managed by the framework.

  • Method Details

    • getPea

      public <T> T getPea​(java.lang.Class<T> classObject)
      Return an instance of the class that implements the interface. There should be no ambiguity when the JIOC scanning mechanism looks for an implementation registered using @Pea annotation.
      Specified by:
      getPea in interface ApplicationConfig
      Parameters:
      classObject - interface type the pea must implement.
      Returns:
      an instance of the pea.
      See Also:
      getPea(Class), XMLApplicationConfig.getPea(Class)
